languages.text: "Чушь и изменнические речи! Никогда Император не осуждал слуг своих за строгость и тщание! Я не творю свой закон, но возвожу в абсолют Его!"
"Treasonous nonsense! Never has the Emperor condemned a servant of His for assiduity and rigour! I do not make my own law — I make His law absolute!"
languages.original_text: "Чушь и изменнические речи! Никогда Император не осуждал слуг своих за строгость и тщание! Я не творю свой закон, но возвожу в абсолют Его!"

traits.locale_text: "Treasonous nonsense! Never has the Emperor condemned a servant of His for assiduity and rigour! I do not make my own law; I make His law absolute!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Treasonous nonsense! Never has the Emperor condemned a servant of His for assiduity and rigour! I do not make my own law; I make His law absolute!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Treasonous nonsense! Never has the Emperor condemned a servant of His for assiduity and rigour! I do not make my own law — I make His law absolute!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Treasonous nonsense! Never has the Emperor condemned a servant of His for assiduity and rigour! I do not make my own law — I make His law absolute!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “胡说八道！简直是大逆不道！帝皇从来不会由于某个仆人勤勉严谨而治她的罪！我没有制定我自己的法律！我的法律完完全全忠于祂的法律！”
languages.original_text: "Treasonous nonsense! Never has the Emperor condemned a servant of His for assiduity and rigour! I do not make my own law — I make His law absolute!"

traits.locale_text: “胡说八道！简直是大逆不道！帝皇从来不会由于某个仆人勤勉严谨而治她的罪！我没有制定我自己的法律！我的法律完完全全忠于祂的法律！”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「反逆罪など馬鹿げている！皇帝はその勤勉さと厳格さゆえに、自身の使いを断罪したことは一度もない！独自の法律など作ってはいない。私はこの世で、皇帝の法律を絶対的になものにしているのだ！」
languages.original_text: "Treasonous nonsense! Never has the Emperor condemned a servant of His for assiduity and rigour! I do not make my own law — I make His law absolute!"

traits.locale_text: 「反逆罪など馬鹿げている！皇帝はその勤勉さと厳格さゆえに、自身の使いを断罪したことは一度もない！独自の法律など作ってはいない。私はこの世で、皇帝の法律を絶対的になものにしているのだ！」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «¡Tonterías! ¡El Emperador jamás ha condenado a un sirviente suyo por diligencia y rigurosidad! No hago mi propia ley, sigo la Suya!».
languages.original_text: "Treasonous nonsense! Never has the Emperor condemned a servant of His for assiduity and rigour! I do not make my own law — I make His law absolute!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Tonterías! ¡El Emperador jamás ha condenado a un sirviente suyo por diligencia y rigurosidad! No hago mi propia ley, sigo la Suya!».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Verräterischer Unfug! Noch nie hat der Imperator einen seiner Diener wegen Beflissenheit und Strenge verdammt! Ich mache nicht meine eigenen Gesetze, ich mache sein Gesetz absolut!"
languages.original_text: "Treasonous nonsense! Never has the Emperor condemned a servant of His for assiduity and rigour! I do not make my own law — I make His law absolute!"

traits.locale_text: "Verräterischer Unfug! Noch nie hat der Imperator einen seiner Diener wegen Beflissenheit und Strenge verdammt! Ich mache nicht meine eigenen Gesetze, ich mache sein Gesetz absolut!"
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Je ne tolérerai pas vos mensonges perfides ! Jamais l'Empereur n'a condamné l'un de Ses serviteurs pour excès d'assiduité et de rigueur ! Je ne fais pas mes propres lois... J'applique les Siennes de façon radicale ! »
languages.original_text: "Treasonous nonsense! Never has the Emperor condemned a servant of His for assiduity and rigour! I do not make my own law — I make His law absolute!"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne tolérerai pas vos mensonges perfides ! Jamais l'Empereur n'a condamné l'un de Ses serviteurs pour excès d'assiduité et de rigueur ! Je ne fais pas mes propres lois, j'applique les Siennes de façon radicale ! »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Haince saçmalıklar! İmparator, hiçbir zaman bir hizmetkârını gayreti ve özeni nedeniyle cezalandırmamıştır! Ben kendi kanunlarımı yaratmıyorum, O'nun kanunlarını mutlak kılıyorum!"
languages.original_text: "Treasonous nonsense! Never has the Emperor condemned a servant of His for assiduity and rigour! I do not make my own law — I make His law absolute!"

traits.locale_text: "Haince saçmalıklar! İmparator hiçbir zaman bir hizmetkârını gayreti ve özeni nedeniyle cezalandırmamıştır! Ben kendi kanunlarımı yaratmıyorum, O'nun kanunlarını mutlak kılıyorum!"
traits.speaker: Chorda
